name: THE GUIDE (henriquejardim)
description:
There was nothing.... and then... THE BIG BANG...

THE GUIDE is a game that uses gravity system.

You need to use your magic touch to create stars to conduct a photon from the beginning of the universe to Earth.

Made for the #brackeysgamejam 2018. The theme is "light", so we imagine how to represent a photon, a "particle" of light, in the outer space and what can interfere in this travel.

Team:
Henrique Jardim (@henriquejardim)
Daniel Guimarães
